mapper.sql: F_ID, F_ASSERTS, F_NAME, F_INST, F_INSTADDR, F_DEPT, F_DEPT1, F_DEPT3, F_ZCID, F_OPERATOR, F_ADMIN, F_ADMIN2, F_ADMIN3, F_USESTAT, F_ABIS, F_IP, F_PORT, F_MAC, F_STYLE, F_INSTSTYLE, F_AREA, F_FUNCAREA, F_USETYPE, F_TYPE, F_MARK, F_SPC, F_UPS, F_PC, F_BOX, F_MBOX, F_MONEYDEV, F_FACID, F_ISPID, F_BUYHT, F_ADMHT, F_SOFTID, F_CURVER, F_LVERSION, F_LVERDATE, F_CODE, F_DTARRIV, F_DTIMAX, F_DTOPEN, F_DTCLOSE, F_DTBX1, F_DTBX2, F_DTREST, F_WORK1, F_WORK2, F_WORKDX, F_DCOST, F_SEARCH, F_MAPID, F_MAPX, F_MAPY, F_GETDATA, F_COLTP, F_VIDID, F_LASTTX, F_FTXSUPP, F_LOGVER, F_SORTIDX, F_REQWH, F_ACKWH, F_DATE, F_SDATE, F_FLAG1, F_FLAG2, F_FLAG3, F_PAD1, F_PAD2, F_PAD3, F_PAD4, f_lastts, f_lastst, f_restime, f_locid, F_TERM, F_PARAM, F_SHOPID, F_SHOPTYPE, F_MAN, F_TEL, F_MSGFLAG, F_MSGWORK1, F_MSGWORK2, F_FLAG, F_AREAID, F_ROOMID, F_ADMINPWD
mapper.select:
SELECT a.F_TYPE,a.F_MARK,count(*) count FROM t_dev a LEFT JOIN t_branch B ON A.F_DEPT=B.F_ID LEFT JOIN t_branch C ON B.F_DEPT=C.F_ID LEFT JOIN t_branch D ON C.F_DEPT=D.F_ID
b.F_DEPTID LIKE concat(#{fDeptid},'%')
GROUP BY a.F_TYPE,a.F_MARK

F_MAPID = #{fMapid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
F_MAPX = #{fMapx,jdbcType=INTEGER},
